txt.en: You have delivered the wood carving

Constable Underhill desires to spread the cheer of the celebration to his friend Esmerelda Burrows.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>
Deliver the wood carving to Esmerelda Burrows in Michel Delving

Esmerelda Burrows is at The Bird and Baby Inn in Michel Delving in the Shire.\n\nConstable Underhill has tasked you with bringing a small, wooden carving to his friend Esmerelda Burrows in Michel Delving.
'Esmerelda spends a lot of time at The Bird and Baby Inn in Michel Delving. I would consider speaking to the stable-master and going on horseback, if I were you.'
'Constable Underhill sent you? It's been ages since... oh! Is that a carving? For me?\n\n'What a funny squirrel carving. Oh, this makes me so happy!'

Esmerelda Burrows is at The Bird and Baby Inn in Michel Delving in the Shire.\n\nConstable Underhill has tasked you with bringing a small, wooden carving to his friend Esmerelda Burrows in Michel Delving.

'Oh, how I miss my old friends in the Shire. I just recently purchased this wooden carving, which reminds me of my friend Esmerelda Burrows in Michel Delving. 

'Esmerelda always loved wooden carvings like this one. Maybe you could bring this one to her? I'm sure it would bring a smile to her face!

'Could you let her know that I sent this and that I wish her well? If you are looking for her, she is often found relaxing at The Bird and Baby Inn.'
'Esmerelda spends a lot of time at The Bird and Baby Inn in Michel Delving. I would consider speaking to the stable-master and going on horseback, if I were you.'
Deliver the wood carving to Esmerelda Burrows in Michel Delving
Deliver the wood carving to Esmerelda in Michel Delving
